uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

new_dscp_value.description: If action is to change DSCP value, this field specifies the new value.

new_priority.description: If action is to change priority value, this field specifies the new value. VLAN priority for wired, WLAN priority for wireless.

rate_limit_in_kbps.description: If action is to limit traffic, this field specifies the rate in kilobits per second.
